name: HandFoot
description:
HandFoot is a sports themed arcade game that tests both your memory and reflexes

The game presents you with different sports themed objects and you have to choose how you would use them by pressing either the hand or the foot button. Doing so earns you points, but you have to be fast because the timer's running out.

The game features original pixel art made with Aseprite.

You can play the game from your browser in this page, download the APK below or get the game from Google Play.

Make sure to leave your feedback and suggestions below.

Contains "It is" song by HorrorPen.

You can NOT redistribute this game.

Thank you for playing!
